## ResourceSlot interface

Defines an available resource slot for a profile. This includes UX properties for how to visually represent it (title, icon, etc).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ResourceSlot 
```

|  [required?](./app-framework.resourceslot.required.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [title](./app-framework.resourceslot.title.md) |  | string |  |
